mapper.insert:
insert into enterprise_master_data.job(job_no, job_name, job_code, job_status, require_number, current_number, remark, deleted, create_time, deleted_time, department_id) values
(#{entity.jobNo}, #{entity.jobName}, #{entity.jobCode}, #{entity.jobStatus}, #{entity.requireNumber}, #{entity.currentNumber}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.deletedTime}, #{entity.departmentId})

insert into enterprise_master_data.job(job_no, job_name, job_code, job_status, require_number, current_number, remark, deleted, create_time, deleted_time, department_id) values
(#{entity.jobNo}, #{entity.jobName}, #{entity.jobCode}, #{entity.jobStatus}, #{entity.requireNumber}, #{entity.currentNumber}, #{entity.remark}, #{entity.deleted}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.deletedTime}, #{entity.departmentId})
on duplicate key update job_no = values(job_no) , job_name = values(job_name) , job_code = values(job_code) , job_status = values(job_status) , require_number = values(require_number) , current_number = values(current_number) , remark = values(remark) , deleted = values(deleted) , create_time = values(create_time) , deleted_time = values(deleted_time) , department_id = values(department_id)
